questions.question: What does Monica say is 'just some guy I work with'?
questions.explanation: Monica tells her friends 'There's nothing to tell! He's just some guy I work with!' when asked about Paul.

questions.question: What is the name of the singer Phoebe's ex-partner?
questions.explanation: Leslie is the singer and Phoebe's ex-partner.

questions.question: What is the name of the song Leslie sings about Phoebe?
options: Phoebe Buffay, What Can I Say
questions.correct_answer: Phoebe Buffay, What Can I Say
questions.explanation: Leslie sings a song about Phoebe called 'Phoebe Buffay, What Can I Say'.

questions.question: Why did Leslie leave Phoebe?
options: To pursue a solo music career
questions.explanation: Leslie left Phoebe to write jingles.

questions.question: What is the name of the jingle Leslie wrote?
questions.explanation: Leslie wrote a jingle called 'Home is never far away', also known as 'Home Star stew'.

questions.question: What is the reason Mark is leaving his job?
options: He quit to pursue a new career
He is moving to a new city
questions.correct_answer: He quit to pursue a new career
questions.explanation: Mark quit his job to pursue a new career.

questions.question: Why is Ross upset about Rachel going to a lecture with Mark?
options: Because Mark is a bad influence
Because Rachel is spending too much time with Mark
Because Ross wants to go to the lecture instead
questions.explanation: Ross is upset because he is jealous of Rachel spending time with Mark.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman Chandler meets in the men's room?
questions.explanation: Chandler meets a woman named Ginger in the men's room.

questions.question: What is the reason Joey is hiding from Ginger?
options: Because he threw her artificial leg on the fire
questions.correct_answer: Because he threw her artificial leg on the fire
questions.explanation: Joey is hiding from Ginger because he threw her artificial leg on the fire.

questions.question: What is the name of the song Phoebe teaches Leslie to sing?
options: Phoebe Buffay, What Can I Say
questions.explanation: Phoebe teaches Leslie to sing 'Smelly Cat'.

questions.question: Why does Leslie play 'Smelly Cat' for her old ad agency?
options: To get Phoebe to forgive her
To sell the song as a jingle
To prove a point to Phoebe
questions.correct_answer: To sell the song as a jingle
questions.explanation: Leslie plays 'Smelly Cat' for her old ad agency to sell it as a jingle.

questions.question: What is the reason Chandler's date with Ginger ends abruptly?
options: Because Ginger has to leave for an emergency
Because Chandler discovers Ginger has an artificial leg
Because Ginger discovers Chandler has a third nipple
Because they have nothing in common
questions.correct_answer: Because Ginger discovers Chandler has a third nipple
questions.explanation: Ginger discovers Chandler has a third nipple, which makes her uncomfortable and ends the date.

questions.question: What does Chandler have removed?
questions.explanation: Chandler has his third nipple removed.

questions.question: What is the reaction of the gang when they hear 'Smelly Cat' being used in a commercial?
questions.explanation: The gang is upset and angry when they hear 'Smelly Cat' being used in a commercial.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe write a new song called 'Jingle Bitch Screwed Me Over'?
options: Because she is angry at Leslie
Because she is happy with her new song
Because she wants to sell it as a jingle
Because she is sad and depressed
questions.correct_answer: Because she is angry at Leslie
questions.explanation: Phoebe writes a new song called 'Jingle Bitch Screwed Me Over' because she is angry at Leslie for selling 'Smelly Cat' as a jingle.

questions.question: What does Ross realize about his relationship with Rachel?
options: That he needs to be more involved in her life
That he needs to give her more space
questions.correct_answer: That he needs to give her more space
questions.explanation: Ross realizes that he needs to give Rachel more space and let her have her own life and interests.

questions.question: What is the name of the lecture Rachel attends with Mark?
questions.explanation: Rachel attends a lecture on fashion trends with Mark.

questions.question: Why does Ross fall asleep during the lecture?
options: Because he is not interested in fashion
questions.explanation: Ross falls asleep during the lecture because he is bored.

questions.question: What does Chandler call his third nipple?
questions.explanation: Chandler calls his third nipple a 'nubbin'.

questions.question: Why does Ginger leave Chandler's apartment abruptly?
options: Because she is upset with him
Because she has to leave for an emergency
Because she discovers his third nipple
Because she is uncomfortable with his sense of humor
questions.correct_answer: Because she discovers his third nipple
questions.explanation: Ginger leaves Chandler's apartment abruptly because she discovers his third nipple.
